document_data.name: Pickleberry
document_data.mainbody: '''Pickleberries''' were a type of berry found growing around [[Longsaddle]] in the [[Savage Frontier]].{{Cite video/Honor Among Thieves}}
document_data.History: In the late 1490s,{{HAT-time}} [[Marlamin]] gathered pickleberries for dinner with a cured [[goose]] with his wife [[Gwinn]] that evening.
